theDuelist:BasicArchetype.NAME: 决斗卡
theDuelist:BasicArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add every Duelist card to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Every single card available in the mod, including random-generation only cards.

theDuelist:DragonsArchetype.NAME: 龙
theDuelist:DragonsArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Dragon cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: All Dragon monsters, Mountain, Flute of Summoning Dragon, Lord of D., Buster Blader, and Dragon Capture Jar. No Toons, no God cards.

theDuelist:MagnetArchetype.NAME: 磁铁
theDuelist:MagnetArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Magnet Warrior cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Alpha Magnet Warrior, Beta Magnet Warrior, Gamma Magnet Warrior, and Valkyrion.

theDuelist:NatureArchetype.NAME: 性质
theDuelist:NatureArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Insect, Plant and Predaplant cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: All Insect, Plant and Predaplant monsters; Cocoon of Evolution, Super Solar Nutrient, Predaponics, Predapruning, and Violet Crystal.

theDuelist:SpellcasterArchetype.NAME: 施法者
theDuelist:SpellcasterArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Spellcaster cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: All Spellcaster monsters, Yami, and Book of Secret Arts. No Exodia cards.

theDuelist:SpellsArchetype.NAME: 法术
theDuelist:SpellsArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Spell cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: All Spells, except for Toon spells and specific keyword spells (like Yami, Mountain, Violet Crystal).

theDuelist:SuperheavyArchetype.NAME: 超重武士
theDuelist:SuperheavyArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Superheavy cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: All Superheavy monsters, plus Steam Train King.

theDuelist:ToonsArchetype.NAME: 动画片
theDuelist:ToonsArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Toon cards to your card pool.

theDuelist:ExodiaArchetype.NAME: Exodia
theDuelist:ExodiaArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Exodia cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 5 pieces of Exoida, plus Legendary Exodia Incarnate.

theDuelist:GodArchetype.NAME: 神
theDuelist:GodArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add all God cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Slifer the Sky Dragon, Obelisk the Tormentor, Winged Dragon of Ra, and the Creator.

theDuelist:GuardianArchetype.NAME: 监护人
theDuelist:GuardianArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Guardian cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Sanga of Thunder, Suijin, Kazejin, and Gate Guardian.

theDuelist:InsectArchetype.NAME: 昆虫
theDuelist:InsectArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Insect cards to your card pool.

theDuelist:OjamaArchetype.NAME: Ojama
